item.title: 印度莫迪在和平峰会前与普京和泽连斯基通话
item.description: 据印度总理办公室称，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪周三与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基和弗拉基米尔-普京通了电话。【原文：India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Vladimir Putin over the phone on Wednesday, weeks ahead of a global peace summit in Switzerland to resolve war in Ukraine, according to the Prime Minister’s Office.】

item.title: 肯尼亚贷款机构运营成本激增，KCB 利润下降 8
item.description: 肯尼亚最大的银行肯尼亚商业银行集团（KCB Group Plc）称，由于运营成本激增 61%，全年利润下降 8%。【原文：KCB Group Plc said full-year profit fell 8% as Kenya’s biggest bank saw operating costs surged 61%.】

item.title: Reddit 股东指导 IPO 价格在区间顶部或以上
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Reddit 公司及其卖方股东正在引导他们将这家社交媒体公司的首次公开募股定价定在市场范围的顶端或更高。【原文：Reddit Inc. and its selling shareholders are guiding that they could price the social media company’s initial public offering at the top of its marketed range or above, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以隐晦的环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）声明来增加奖金的做法受到激进分子的质疑
item.description: 随着公司越来越多地将高管薪酬与环境、社会和公司治理挂钩，有证据表明，附加条款被用来提高薪酬待遇，而没有带来任何有意义的环境、社会和公司治理方面的改善。【原文：As companies increasingly tie executive pay to ESG, there’s evidence to suggest the add-on is being used to enable bigger remuneration packages without leading to any meaningful environmental, social or governance improvement.】

item.title: Access 银行将收购肯尼亚 NBK 银行，加强在主要市场的影响力
item.description: Access Bank Plc 计划收购 KCB Group Plc 旗下的肯尼亚国家银行，从而加强尼日利亚最大银行在东非重要市场的地位。【原文：Access Bank Plc plans to acquire National Bank of Kenya from KCB Group Plc, boosting the foothold of Nigeria’s biggest bank in a key East African market.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司债券持有者在 120 亿美元股权损失后毫发无损
item.description: 巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）在总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的政治压力下决定不发放特别股息，这引发了股票抛售，使这家国有石油生产商的市值缩水数十亿美元。不过，债券持有者的日子还不错。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA’s decision to skip a special dividend amid political pressure from President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva triggered an equity selloff that wiped billions from the state-owned oil producer’s market capitalization. Bondholders, however, are doing just fine.】

item.title: 道富加强平台建设，扩大人员轮岗，为结算规则变更做准备
item.description: 美国道富银行（State Street Corp. ）花了一年多的时间准备其技术，以加快结算时间，加入了众多金融机构的行列，进行调整以避免因 5 月底生效的新法规而可能出现的交易失败。【原文：State Street Corp. has spent more than a year preparing its technology for faster settlement times, joining a slew of financial institutions making adjustments to avoid failed trades that could occur as a result of new regulations that come into effect late May.】

item.title: 高盛谋划成为前五大模式投资组合参与者的路线
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）正在规划一条通往顶级企业的道路，预计到本十年末，该公司将发展成为一个价值超过 10 万亿美元的行业。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is charting a path to break into the top ranks of what’s projected to grow into a more than $10 trillion industry by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 成本增加，安哥拉政府工人为提高薪酬举行罢工
item.description: 安哥拉政府工人开始了为期三天的罢工，要求提高工资和降低税收，以弥补非洲第二大石油生产国不断上涨的生活成本。【原文：Angolan government workers began a three-day strike to press for higher wages and lower taxes to make up for rising living costs in Africa’s second-biggest oil producer.】

item.title: 债券投资者热衷于类似 AT1 的特殊类型债务
item.description: 一个与银行额外一级债券相似的神秘保险债券市场正在升温，投资者正急于购买这种债券，而监管截止日期使得今年的供应量可能激增。【原文：An esoteric insurance bond market with similarities to banks’ Additional Tier 1s is heating up, with investors rushing to buy the debt just as a regulatory deadline makes a surge in supply likely this year.】

item.title: 在对贷款人的审查增加后，Finma 计划对瑞银进行压力测试
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构Finma表示，今年将对瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）进行两次压力测试，因为该机构在收购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）后加强了对该银行的监管。【原文：Switzerland’s financial regulator Finma said it would carry out two stress tests at UBS Group AG this year, as the authority boosts oversight of the lender in the wake of its acquisition of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 惠誉将卡塔尔天然气投资评级升至第三高
item.description: 惠誉将卡塔尔的信用评级从 AA-上调至 AA，使这个天然气资源丰富的国家的信用评级高于法国和英国。【原文：Qatar was upgraded to AA from AA- by Fitch, lifting the gas-rich country’s credit rating above that of France and the UK.】

item.title: 推进海外业务，收入超出预期，PDD 跳涨 15
item.description: PDD Holdings Inc. 周三在纽约盘前交易中股价大涨 15%，此前该公司公布了因加强海外扩张而高于预期的收入。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s shares jumped 15% in New York premarket trading Wednesday after the company reported stronger-than-expected revenue as it ramped up its overseas expansion.】

item.title: 吉利称政府不会施压购买本地汽车芯片
item.description: 浙江吉利控股集团有限公司（Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co.浙江吉利控股集团有限公司总裁安迪反驳了中国政府要求电动汽车制造商增加从本地芯片制造商采购的说法，他说，中国是世界上最大的汽车市场，汽车制造商可以根据自己的需要采购。【原文：Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co. President Andy An pushed back against the notion the Chinese government has asked electric vehicle makers to increase purchases from local chipmakers, saying automakers in the world’s largest car market can source whatever fits their needs.】

item.title: 中国太阳能制造商取消价值 13 亿美元的工厂
item.description: 中国太阳能制造商凌达集团股份有限公司终止了新建一座91.5亿元人民币（13亿美元）电池生产厂的计划，因为严重的产能过剩威胁着该行业的破产和整合浪潮。【原文：Chinese solar manufacturer Lingda Group Co. has terminated plans to build a new 9.15 billion yuan ($1.3 billion) cell production plant as severe overcapacity threatens a wave of bankruptcies and consolidations in the industry.】

item.title: 南非银行卷入英国汽车金融大调查
item.description: 随着监管机构继续在全行业范围内调查汽车贷款的销售方式是否公平对待客户，天达集团（Investec Plc）已预留资金，用于支付可能与英国汽车金融业务相关的赔偿和其他费用。【原文：Investec Plc has set aside funds to pay for possible compensation and other costs linked to its auto finance business in the UK as regulators continue with an industrywide probe into whether such loans were sold in a way that treated customers fairly.】

item.title: 莱茵金属首席执行官帕佩尔格在涨幅达 1200% 后套现
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司（Rheinmetall AG）首席执行官阿明-帕佩尔格（Armin Papperger）自 2013 年 1 月掌舵以来，公司股价飙升了近 1200%，他从欧洲军备需求推动的涨势中获利颇丰。【原文：Rheinmetall AG Chief Executive Officer Armin Papperger, who has overseen an almost 1,200% surge in the shares since taking the helm in January 2013, is pocketing profits from a rally fueled by demand for armaments in Europe.】
